author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
Thanks to new Tolkien writings released in 2024, we now know more than ever about cold-drakes!  These dragons, who now include Scatha, had an icy breath that froze victims with fear!

The Collected Poems of JRR Tolkien: https://amzn.to/40P9Lp9

Hit subscribe and turn on notifications for great Tolkien content every week!

title: Scatha & the Cold-drakes | Tolkien Explained
